::Perndabot::

Perndabot growls, walking over to Klant and aiming his massive gun at the 
bot. "Here's the deal," he says, "You quit firing, politely step aside, and 
let us through, or I kill you."

The huge bot looks down at Klant, ready to blast him to the pit if 
neccessary. Being cloaked, the autoguns didn't detect him or BrightBlade, 
even though they were visible due to water and powder.
